statements: DELETE FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE intersection_id = 1 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE intersection_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00'
DELETE FROM traffic_patterns WHERE intersection_id = 101 AND vehicle_type = 'car';
DELETE FROM signal_timings WHERE red_light_duration = 30 AND green_light_duration = 60;
DELETE FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_speed > 80 AND direction = 'North';
DELETE FROM intersection_signals WHERE intersection_name = 'Main Street' AND signal_duration > 30;
